hasPart.name: Summer in the Grossglockner Resort - Kals / Matrei
hasPart.text:
Enjoy the breathtaking panorama of the 3,000 m and the view of Austria's highest mountain. Keep comfortable with the cable or the cars to the best starting points for wonderful walks. A real treat for young and old. Between Kals aG and Matrei offers a sea of ​​three thousand with the highest mountains of Austria - the Grossglockner at 3,798 m and the Großvenediger with 3,674 m. Impressive glaciers, the first water viewing path of Europe and the largest national park in Central Europe invite you on a journey. And it is this summer to compete. A holiday in the Grossglockner Resort Kals / Matrei is mountain holiday of superlatives.

The Adler Lounge in the Grossglockner Resort Kals-Matrei offers in the summer with a unique view and culinary delights.

hasPart.name: Kals am Grossglockner
hasPart.text: ... stands as a meeting point for all those who want to enjoy nature in its originality. Living tradition and village culture are the focus. The village, which is actually a valley, offers originality. Here emphasis is placed on personal attention, peace and genuine hospitality. Kals aG on Grossglockner in a charming setting offers a hiking paradise for the whole family and inspired whim to enjoy hiking or the real summit.

hasPart.name:
Matrei
in East Tyrol
hasPart.text: Matrei is considered the center of the holiday and recreation area of ​​the Hohe Tauern National Park. This National Park is one of the last natural landscapes of Austria and easily accessible with the cable cars. The park is a refuge for many endangered animal and plant species. A holiday in the national park region's mountain holiday of superlatives. Panorama offers 60 three thousand meter peaks, impressive glaciers and rushing mountain streams, are sources of new energy. Both in summer and in winter, the Grossglockner Resort Kals / Matrei is easily accessible. A seemingly endless wide range of different sports makes your holiday in Grossglockner Resort Alpin a special holiday.
